resources.string: This is an application for displaying different styles of shoes present in the Shoe Store.
Please click on the below button to move forward and explore the store !!!

This is a demo application of Shoe Store.
 This is a course work under udacity android nanodegree
 User can add the details of the shoe and on adding data it will be store in Room Database If the database is empty then it means no data saved in the database. On clicking of the Add floating action button, the screen will be redirected to the next screen 
 where user can fill the details of the shoe and save it. If user wants to cancel the operation then simply press the Cancel button and it will redirect to the previous screen. If the user saves any data then those data will be displayed as list view. User can either login and then enter into the app or just hit Welcome Screen button and enter inside the app.
Forget the hassle, shoes are at your fingertip.
Please enter the details about the shoe for Shoe Store
